column3: @laanwj Here is the PR from conversation we had in #11475 I would like a review on to make sure my understanding was correct.  Adds `minRelayTxFee` to the JSON response of `getmempoolinfo` and updates help description of updated `mempoolminfee`.  Thank you!

Thanks for the patch\n\nI think the key from the Pair should be lower case https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12001/files#diff-a0c8f511d90e83aa9b5857e819ced344R1361 (test also needs update in this case).
@mess110 Made suggested lowercase updates and amended my original commit.\n\nThanks for the review!

Tested ACK, but needs tests reworked a bit.

Wallet is the wrong place to put mempool tests. Please move this one and your addition to mempool_limit.py

See following diff for a sketch:
